name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Introduction to Tactical Skills and Knowledge
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Introduction to Tactical Skills and Knowledge
long_desc: This course is meant to enrich individual tactical knowledge and skills. The course has three main objectives firstly, to provide entrylevel tactical knowledge that prepares individuals for a variety of situations, problems and emergencies. Secondly, to expose students to the concept of unarmed and armed selfdefense. Finally, to teach basic means of improving and maintaining tactical fitness. After completing this course, students should feel more confident in their abilities, and have the foundations to further their learning.
